attributes.action: Publish all wills which have resulted in money being handed over to political parties.
attributes.additional_details: Data protection provisions do not extend beyond death and details of other beneficiaries of any will published can be redacted (our dishonourables know how to do that) but the public MUST be able to see the wording of wills where money has gone to political parties.  Recent events reveal that our dishonourables simply cannot be trusted to act with honest, integrity nor probity when it comes to political advantage and other people's money. We MUST be given the opportunity to oversight this aspect of our dishonourables' activity, to ensure they are NOT conducting themselves true to form again.
